sentences.sentence: The value of India and Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2017.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of Britain.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016 and 2017 in Britain is greatly lower India.

sentences.sentence: The value of India and Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2017.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of Britain.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016 and 2017 in Britain is greatly lower India.
